Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 1106
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2013 ckjdß ui 04 jeks
Èk m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2012 foieïn¾ ui 21 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
ie' hq' —  fujr m<jk .eiÜ m;%fha  V fldgfia 2009 j¾Ifha Tlaf;dan¾ isg foieïn¾ olajd ld¾;=jg wod<j uqøK Ys,amSkaf.a yd
m%ldYlhskaf.a wd{mk; hgf;a ,shdmÈxÑ jQ fmd;a kdudj,shla bx.%Sis NdIdfjka m<fõ'
ie' hq'-  oyï mdi,a .=re wruqo, ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2012 fkdjeïn¾ ui 02 jeks Èk  Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl
iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
jhsÜ frdaia moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2012 fkdjeïn¾ ui 02 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha
 .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'12'141106
Èid wêlrK yd ufyaia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyaia;%d;a wêlrKh - lE.,a,
l,a bl=;aj we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
lE.,a, ufyaia;%d;a wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka 66 j.ka;sh hgf;a
jk kvq jd¾;d 2013'03'14 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' fuu kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yajlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda
kvqjg f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2013'03'14 Èkg m%:ufhka fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj;
bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2013'03'14 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid
úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
